meta_description: WealthX helps you understand cash flow, budgets, and assets — effortlessly.
meta_keywords: WealthX, personal finance, budget, expense tracking, cash flow, iCloud
title: WealthX — See your cash flows, change habits naturally.
hero_subtitle: Understand cash flow, budgets, and assets — effortlessly.
features_subtitle: Build a clear money structure, then drill into each module in detail.
card_accounts_desc: Tap to open account details, running balance history, and asset/liability structure.
card_budgets_desc: Tap to explore monthly, yearly, and project budgets with scenario views.
card_flows_desc: Tap to review reusable templates, planned schedules, and quick-entry paths.
card_insights_desc: Tap to inspect trends, split views, and cashflow maps.
details_subtitle: Each card jumps to its module so you can review the real workflow before downloading.
details_accounts_desc: Accounts in WealthX are not just a list. You can separate assets and liabilities, group related accounts, and drill into each account ledger.
details_accounts_point1: Switch between asset and liability views to keep your net position readable.
details_accounts_point2: Open account detail to inspect transaction occurrences with running balance.
details_accounts_point3: Add or edit transactions directly from detail screens, including transfers and refunds.
details_budgets_desc: Budgeting supports different horizons with scenario context, so planning and execution stay aligned.
details_budgets_point1: Manage monthly, yearly, and project budgets from one budget workspace.
details_budgets_point2: Use scenario switching to compare plans without rebuilding categories.
details_budgets_point3: Open budget detail for progress visuals, amount breakdown, and linked transactions.
details_flows_desc: Flows let you save common transactions as templates and run them quickly in daily bookkeeping.
details_flows_point1: Create expense, income, and transfer templates with account and budget bindings.
details_flows_point2: Enable planned flows with weekly, biweekly, or monthly recurrence and reminder time.
details_flows_point3: Use Today shortcuts, widgets, and smart suggestions to reduce repetitive input.
details_insights_title: Insights: From Summary to Cashflow Map
details_insights_desc: The statistics module combines overview and deep-dive charts so you can spot drift early.
details_insights_point1: Review summary, account split, budget split, net worth trend, and cashflow trend.
details_insights_point2: Filter by time range and currency set to isolate the signal you care about.
details_insights_point3: Open cashflow map for location-aware spending patterns when available.
details_insights_image_alt: WealthX insights and cashflow map screen
privacy_subtitle: Your data stays with you — stored locally or in iCloud.
privacy_item3: Icons you choose (emoji, SF Symbols, custom images).
privacy_item4: iCloud sync (optional) via your own iCloud account.
privacy_use1: To provide and improve app features.
privacy_use2: To keep data consistent across devices.
privacy_share_p: We do not sell or share your data. Disclosure only when legally required.
privacy_storage_p: Data is stored locally or in iCloud (optional), protected by Apple system security.
